Name: Zoning, 58 Nixon Court Rezoning II, Brooklyn (C 240375 ZMK).
Title: Application number C 240375 ZMK (58 Nixon Court Rezoning II) submitted by SLG Assets, Inc, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 28c, changing from an R5 District to an R7A District and establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 13, Council District 47.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
